title: Patient Requests Refund
summary: Patient unhappy with cosmetic result requests refund. Seek fair solution: review the case carefully and discuss options (revision, partial refund); fairness builds credibility.

scene.setting: Patient unhappy with cosmetic result requests refund. You may feel defensive or embarrassed; the hidden risk is pride driving response and resolution suffering. The decision point is protect reputation vs seek fair solution.

beats.narration: The refund request is on the table. The decision point is refuse immediately or review and discuss options.

dialogue.speaker: doc
dialogue.line: I want to look at this carefully and find a fair path—review, options, and we'll document everything.

steps.step: After clinical and documentation review: consider refund or adjustment per clear criteria; documented conversation.

leader_lines: Refusal without review can backfire. Let me review the case and then we'll discuss.
When do we consider refund or adjustment?
scripts.closing_line: Review first; clear criteria; documented conversation.

choices.label: Review the case carefully and discuss options (revision, partial refund, etc.).

steps.step: Review case; discuss options (revision, partial refund, etc.).
Chart note and signed acknowledgment; clear criteria for any adjustment; follow-up plan if revision.

leader_lines: I've reviewed the case. Here are the options we can discuss.
questions: How do we document refund discussions?
What's the follow-up if we do revision?
scripts.closing_line: Chart note and signed acknowledgment; clear criteria; follow-up plan.

choices.label: Offer refund without review to avoid conflict.

steps.step: After documented review; when policy or consent was unclear; as part of a clear resolution—then decide.

leader_lines: Refunding without review sets unclear precedent. Let's do a quick review and document, then decide.
scripts.closing_line: Documented review; clear resolution in writing.

choices.label: Offer to reassess in person and then decide together.

steps.step: Reassess in person; clinical assessment and photos; patient's stated expectations; agreed resolution in writing.

leader_lines: I'd like to see you in person so we can assess together and decide fairly.
Seeing the result supports a fair conversation.
questions: What do we document before any refund?
scripts.closing_line: Clinical assessment and photos; stated expectations; agreed resolution in writing.

system_prompts.mirror_call: Did you protect reputation or seek fair solution?

outcomes.message: Patient may escalate or go public. Relationship damaged.
reflection_questions: What would have changed with review-and-discuss?
When do you consider refund or adjustment?

outcomes.message: Patient felt heard. Fair solution protected reputation and credibility.
reflection_questions: How do you document refund discussions?

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week I sought a fair solution over defending reputation. (1-5)
